page.title: 13ISMAILS GARAGE
page.content: At the petrol pumps they sell 2000 gallons a week. This fuel is stored in tanks undergroud and pumped up by electric pumps.The garage has been open since 1976 and they sell an average of 100 cars a year. There are 8-10 used cars on show and the most popular makes are Ford, Vauxall and Talbot. We were shown the Four Post Lift which takes the cars up high enough for the mechanics to work underneath in safety. They have oxy-acetylene welding equipment and a dust free room for spray painting cars. In the spares store they keep all the small components to service cars and keep them in good repair.The garage is open from 08.00hrs to 19.00hrs.
